name: Md Hasibul Hasan
summary: AI/ML Engineer with 3+ years of experience in vision, audio, and multimodal systems. Skilled in designing and deploying deep learning models for video classification, image enhancement, and intelligent audio processing. Built an image transformation API that estimates depth using DepthAnything V2 and applies DSLR-like bokeh using edge-aware matting.
Created a production-ready enhancement pipeline focused on visual realism and user customization.
Combined depth perception and segmentation for precision portrait effect rendering.
